name: DINOOP SOMASUNDARAN
top_product: AI-Based Instant Photo Delivery System Revolutionizing event photography with face recognition technology. Guests can instantly access their own photos via QR code — ideal for weddings, corporate events, and BNI meetings. Wedding Photography & Videography Packages Full-day candid and traditional coverage, including cinematic wedding films, highlight reels, and social media edits. Special expertise in Christian and destination weddings. Pre-Wedding & Save-the-Date Shoots Creative, cinematic shoots that capture your story in scenic locations — perfect for announcements and social sharing. Maternity & Newborn Photography Safe, gentle, and beautifully styled sessions for expecting mothers, newborns, and families, either at home or in-studio. Family Portrait Sessions & Lifestyle Shoots Timeless portraits captured candidly or classically — ideal for milestones, reunions, or annual family updates. Event Coverage for Birthdays, Baptisms & Anniversaries Professional photography and video for life’s special moments with fast delivery and curated album options. Corporate & Branding Visuals High-quality photo and video coverage for events, brand launches, conferences, and personal branding — trusted by top corporate clients.
ideal_referral: Wedding planners, event coordinators, venues looking to partner with a dependable photographer for South Indian, Christian, or destination weddings. Expecting couples, new parents, or families seeking a photographer who balances safety with artistic flair for maternity and newborn shoots. HR leaders or marketing heads organizing corporate events, conferences, or brand launches, who need professional visuals to showcase their company.
top_problem_solved: At D3S Cochin Photography, we solve a common problem: guests and clients waiting days (or even weeks) to see their event photos. Using our AI-based face recognition photo delivery system, we provide instant, personalized access to photos — even during the event! Our system automatically detects and tags faces, so guests can find only their own photos instantly by simply scanning a QR code. This means: No more scrolling through thousands of images. Each person receives a custom album sorted just for them. Perfect for BNI events, corporate functions, weddings, and family gatherings. This also makes it easier for us to: Deliver albums faster. Organize high volumes of photos by person or group. Create a better experience for both clients and their guests. Our BNI members benefit by getting: Instant content for social media or marketing during or immediately after events. Easy, AI-sorted collections to create albums or promo materials. A tech-savvy, time-saving solution they can confidently refer to clients.
my_favourite_bni_story: One of our proudest moments as a BNI member was being chosen as the official photography partner for BNI Celebrate – Cochin Region, as well as the Onam celebrations organized by the region. These events brought together hundreds of dynamic entrepreneurs, and we were thrilled to capture the energy, connections, and joyful moments. We also showcased our AI-based instant photo delivery system, which allowed members and guests to access their photos in real time — making the experience more engaging and memorable. These events not only strengthened our brand visibility but also opened up valuable connections and new business opportunities through the BNI network. We’re deeply grateful to the BNI Cochin Region leadership for trusting us and giving us the platform to shine. Thank you to all the Cochin region heads for your constant support and for creating such an inspiring business community.
